@jennamariepiano @Schmopera

@Twitter how come I click a link to a quoted tweet it takes me 2 https://t.co/EnoWoRrJr2 asking me to d/l the app WHICH IS WHERE I STARTED?
@syracuseopera how about paying professional to do this like every other company & not ask artists 2 work 4 free? https://t.co/v95MY29ec7
@GOtransit a genuine question was asked. I'd also like to know the answer. https://t.co/x1UuK7Y5bu
@BeauPinto Get well soon! All the best!
@BeauPinto Phewf, I'm glad. Circular conversations are boring. How did you cure your disability? You say you were disabled?
@BeauPinto @nofrillsCA Who didn't read either the print on his VISA where it states only valid at participating VISA retailers.
@BeauPinto Categorically false.
@BeauPinto you already did say they had it posted.
@BeauPinto I also am a business owner and consumer who has to adhere to my merchant agreements when processing credit cards.
@BeauPinto So everywhere now needs to post what they DON'T accept as well? Is this your solution as opposed to being an informed consumer?
@BeauPinto @Visa @nofrillsCA See earlier re: PC Financial.
@BeauPinto @nofrillsCA That would be horrible, and would suck. But they're not a charity.
@BeauPinto @nofrillsCA If you're that "loyal" you'd know they don't accept VISA
@BeauPinto @nofrillsCA So you all made the same mistake. You've already admitted they posted their accepted currencies/cards.
@BeauPinto @nofrillsCA Ever heard of something called "precedent"? The co. can't b penalized 4 your inability to read a clearly posted sign
@BeauPinto @nofrillsCA The point is, this was YOUR error, not theirs. & No bz I've ever been to posts what they "don't accept"(save cheques)
@BeauPinto @nofrillsCA I can't speak to that. All I can say is you misread a sign, and got embarrassed. Ya it sucks, I've done it too, (1/2)
@BeauPinto @nofrillsCA That 'owner' is a franchisee. He can't make that call 4 you. It would be in direct violation of his company's policy
@BeauPinto @nofrillsCA Which, as consumer, is the best way to send a message. Not berate frontline staff for an overarching corporate policy
@BeauPinto @nofrillsCA PC is a financial institution as well that carries Mastercard products. There's probably a contractual obligation.

@D_G_Donaldson You may find more information here.
https://t.co/FXrxuidPDw
@BeauPinto @nofrillsCA They made a sign - you misinterpreted it. They're not obliged to tell you what they don't accept - only what they do.
@D_G_Donaldson Hey, I'm glad you loved them. Unfortunately, I'm no longer involved w/ Confidential Opera Project. Best to chk their website
@BeauPinto @nofrillsCA so where's the problem - I don't see how it's their fault that you misinterpreted their signage.

@BeauPinto @nofrillsCA don't they have stickers posted on doors (like all bizs) what forms of payment they take.
Also. It's a No Frills...
